name: MeditationMinder
0:
”Alexa, ask Meditation Minder to set a timer for twenty minutes”
”Alexa, ask Meditation Minder to set a timer for one hour with five intervals”
”Alexa, ask Meditation Minder for an alarm in forty-five seconds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meditation minder
des: This skill periodically rings a temple bell at set intervals, for a defined amount of time. (For example, "set a timer for one hour with four intervals" will ring a bell every fifteen minutes".) The maximum possible duration is one hour and the maximum number of intervals is five.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
